title: DDFP 346: Shek and Ike Taylor
itunes:title: DDFP 346: Shek and Ike Taylor
description:
Shek is joined by newly-retired NFL player and co-host Ike Taylor to discuss Troy Polamalu (13:09) and all-time greatest Steelers (16:15). Ike then reveals the best moments of his NFL career before the Colts’ Mike Adams (21:50) joins in to debate best safeties and the AFC South’s best player: Andrew Luck or J.J. Watt(26:03)? Lastly, the guys discuss Marcus Mariota vs. Jameis Winston (36:20) and answer your tweets alongside Handsome Hank and Marcas Grant(45:04). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
